remarks: Properties that determine a subspace of a left module or left vector space.  (Contributed by NM, 8-Dec-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 8-Jan-2015.)
statement:
islssd.f $e |- ( ph -> F = ( Scalar ` W ) ) $.
islssd.b $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` F ) ) $.
islssd.v $e |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` W ) ) $.
islssd.p $e |- ( ph -> .+ = ( +g ` W ) ) $.
islssd.t $e |- ( ph -> .x. = ( .s ` W ) ) $.
islssd.s $e |- ( ph -> S = ( LSubSp ` W ) ) $.
islssd.u $e |- ( ph -> U C_ V ) $.
islssd.z $e |- ( ph -> U =/= (/) ) $.
islssd.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ a e. U /\ b e. U ) ) -> ( ( x .x. a ) .+ b ) e. U ) $.
islssd $p |- ( ph -> U e. S ) $.
$d B a b $.
$d U a b x $.
$d W a b x $.
$d a b ph x $.
